newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Thai Danu Bank sets US$130 mln FRCD.
newsitem.headline: Thai Danu Bank sets US$130 mln FRCD.

text.p: Thai Danu Bank's US$130 million floating rate certificate of deposite issue is in general syndication, bankers said.
BORROWER THAI DANU BANK
AMOUNT US$130 MLN (A)US$100 MLN, (B)US$30 MLN
COUPON (A) 6ML+60 (B) 6ML+40 MATURITY 5 YRS
TYPE FRCD ISS PRICE PAR REPLIES 11.MAR.97
PUT (A) YR 3 (B) ANNUAL CALLS (A) YR 3 (B) ANNUAL
LISTING NONE REPAYMENT BULLET DENOMS US$500K
RATING -- SALE LMTS STANDARD TAX PROV --
HOME CTRY THAILAND GOV LAW ENGLISH PAY DATE APR 97
MGT LEVELS AND FEES
CO-ARRANGERS (A) US$6 MLN 81 BP ALL-IN 87 BP
(B) US$2 MLN 18 BP ALL-IN 58 BP
CO-LEADS (A) US$3-5 MLN 75 BP ALL-IN 85 BP
(B) US$2 MLN 17 BP ALL-IN 57 BP
MANAGERS (A) US$2-3 MLN 69 BP ALL-IN 83 BP
(B) US$ 1 MLN 16 BP ALL-IN 56 BP
ARRANGER BNP SINGAPORE, BAYERISCHE LANDESBANK SINGAPORE,
BAYERISCHE VEREINSBANK SINGAPORE, DEUTSCHE MORGAN
GRENFELL, SOCIETE GENERALE ASIA, TAT LEE BANK,
TOKYO-MITSUBISHI INTERNATIONAL HK, AND DEVELOPMENT
